pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities and Design Aids for Up-and-Down Dose-Finding Studies // Up-and-Down (UD) is the most popular design approach for dose- finding, but it has been severely under-served by the statistical and computing communities. This is the first package that comprehensively addresses UD's needs. Recent applied UD tutorial: Oron et al., 2022 doi:10.1097/ALN.0000000000004282. Recent methodological overview: Oron and Flournoy, 2024 doi:10.51387/24-NEJSDS74.
